Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

MILES_INSTALL_STATUS

The basic type MILES_INSTALL_STATUS specifies possible results from loading a DOS driver.

Fundamental Values

 Value  Description
 AIL_INIT_SUCCESS specifies that the driver was successfully loaded and initialized. (Debugger value: 0).
 AIL_NO_INI_FILE specifies that no DIG.INI file was present. (Debugger value: 1).
 AIL_INIT_FAILURE specifies that a valid DIG.INI file was present but the specified driver could not be successfully loaded or initialized. (Debugger value: 2).


Group: 2D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_install_DIG_INI, AIL_install_MDI_INI
